headline: S&P Global Appoints Chief Strategy Officer for Mobility Global Completing New Executive Leadership Team
summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) today announced the appointment of Martin Metzker as Chief Strategy Officer of S&P Global Mobility ("Mobility Global"), effective immediately. Mr. Metzker will be responsible for leading Mobility Global's Strategy function and overseeing Communications and Enterprise marketing for the business as it prepares for its planned separation from S&P Global into a standalone public company. Mr. Metzker joins the company from Boston Consulting Group, and will report to Bill Eager

headline: Jim Ratcliffe’s chemicals empire suffers debt downgrade
summary: Sir Jim Ratcliffe’s debt-laden petrochemicals empire has been put under deepening strain after a downgrade of its credit rating.

headline: S&P Global (SPGI) Offers Attractive Entry Point
summary: S&P Global (NYSE:SPGI) is one of the 12 oversold financial stocks to invest in according to hedge funds. On February 12, the price target on S&P Global (NYSE:SPGI) was reduced from $601 to $482 by BMO Capital analyst Jeffrey Silber, who maintained an Outperform rating on the stock after its minor earnings miss in the […]

headline: A Look At S&P Global (SPGI) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: What S&P Global (SPGI) offers investors today S&P Global (SPGI) sits at the center of global capital markets through its benchmarks, data and analytics, and index businesses, giving investors exposure to a wide range of information driven revenues. The company reports annual revenue of US$15.3b and net income of US$4.5b, spread across five segments that include Market Intelligence, Ratings, Energy, Mobility, and S&P Dow Jones Indices, each serving different parts of financial and commodity...

headline: RingCentral Joins S&P Indices As Valuation And Risks Draw Attention
summary: RingCentral (NYSE:RNG) has been added to the S&P 1000, S&P Composite 1500, and S&P 600 indices. The company is now included in the Information Technology sector classifications within these indices. Index inclusion can influence visibility and demand for shares as index funds adjust their holdings. RingCentral enters these S&P indices with a recent share price of $29.56 and mixed return history. The stock is up 5.2% over the past week and 12.4% over the past 30 days, while the 1 year, 3...
